# Repository Topics for GitHub

Add these topics to your GitHub repository for better discoverability:

## Topics to Add (via GitHub UI)

1. Go to your repository: https://github.com/maiz-an/DevTunnel
2. Click on the gear icon next to "About"
3. Add these topics:

```
dev-tunnel
localhost-tunnel
cloudflare-tunnel
ngrok-alternative
port-forwarding
local-development
vite
react
nextjs
nodejs
npm-package
development-tools
web-development
proxy-server
tunnel-service
zero-config
cross-platform
windows
macos
linux
cli-tool
developer-tools
```

## Why These Topics?

- **Primary keywords**: dev-tunnel, localhost-tunnel, cloudflare-tunnel
- **Search terms**: ngrok-alternative, port-forwarding
- **Frameworks**: vite, react, nextjs, nodejs
- **Platforms**: windows, macos, linux, cross-platform
- **Type**: npm-package, cli-tool, development-tools

These topics help GitHub's search algorithm and make your repository discoverable when users search for related terms.
